item.title: Deploy a Hugo website using Github Actions on Github Pages
item.description: Introduction In this guide, I’m going to explain how I’m deploying this website to Github Pages with couple of git commit (and followed by git push of course). Links will be provided to the other guides I used for reference as we go along the process. The choice for Hugo as a static site generator is mainly because: It is very quick to build. The ability to use markdown syntax to create your pages is nice.
